description: Configuration for various projectile shot by guns on ships.

propertyNames.description: Projectile names must be a sequence of basic alphanumeric characters without a space.

tex.description: The gestalt ID of the texture for this projectile. The file should have 'Projectile' as a prefix.

texSz.description: The scale factor of the texture of this projectile.

speed.description: The speed of this projectile when fired.

physSize.description: The diameter of the bounding circle of this projectile.

stretch.description: True if the texture should stretch vertically to resize, false to scale the texture instead. Defaults to false.

dmgType.description: The type of damage dealt by this projectile on contact.

collisionSound.description: The gestalt id of the sound effect played on projectile collision

lightSz.description: The size of the light source on this projectile. Size of zero by default.

guideRotationSpeed.description: How fast the projectile will guide itself towards a target. 0 by default.

zeroAbsSpd.description: True if bullet velocity should not be relative to the gun's velocity. False by default.

acceleration.description: The acceleration acting on this projectile. Zero by default.

workSound.description: The gestalt ID of the sound played every frame of the projectile's motion.

massless.description: True if the projectile does not have mass. False by default.

density.description: The density of this projectile. Effects various collision behavior. -1 by default.

dmg.description: The base damage caused to an object when shot by this projectile

emTime.description: The time that an enemy is disabled after collision. 0 by default.

aoeRadius.description: The radius that an enemy must be within to be effected by the projectile. A negative number disables this effect. -1 by default.

vec2.$comment: 2 float values separated by one or more spaces, ints also accepted

effectFile.description: The gestalt id of the .emitter file for this particle effect.

tex.description: The gestalt id of the particle texture for this effect.

tint.description: A keyword of a color defined in colorsConfig or in GameColors.java. Must be any sequence of basic alphanumeric characters without a space.

floatsUp.description: True if particles will float opposing the gravity of the nearest planet, default false.

size.description: The default unit size of each individual particle. Almost always overwritten for special effects.
